articles.notes: Bharat ne MIRV technology ke saath Agni-5 missile ka safal parikshan kiya hai. Ye ek saath kai targets ko nishana bana sakti hai aur iski range 5000km+ hai.
articles.question: Agni-5 missile ki range lagbhag kitni hai?

articles.notes: Ye Bharat aur France ke beech hone wala ek sanyukt sainya abhyas (Military Exercise) hai jo aatankwad virodhi abhiyanon par kendrit hai.
articles.question: Exercise 'SHAKTI' kin do deshon ke beech hoti hai?

articles.notes: Bharat ne Philippines ko BrahMos supersonic cruise missiles ki pehli khep export ki hai. Ye Bharat ke defence export sector ke liye badi uplabdhi hai.
articles.question: Bharat ne BrahMos missile kis desh ko export ki hai?
